FuncDef:
The http server ip-block reactive command sets the interval after which a locked client IP address is automatically unlocked.
The undo http server ip-block reactive command restores the automatic unlocking time of a locked client IP address to the default value. The http server ip-block reactive command sets the interval after which a locked client IP address is automatically unlocked. The undo http server ip-block reactive command restores the automatic unlocking time of a locked client IP address to the default value. By default, the automatic unlocking time of a locked client IP address is 5 minutes.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the period after which the locked client IP address is automatically unlocked.
The value is an integer ranging from 1 to 1000, in minute.
